title: CANT SEE SHYT FOR YEAR IN REVIEW
body: ONE HELL BLOODY YELLOW CIRCLE GOING AROUND WITHOUT DISPLAYING ANY USEFUL INFORMATION, TYPICAL RIOT SHYT.

replies.body:
Just use the site instead of the client if you're having trouble.
https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/year-in-review-2017#/
I played a game and when my client went back it had loaded
Same just takes some load time.
